message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.CL 

This paper is about recommendation systems, which typically fall under the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. The paper also proposes a new method for modeling user-item relationships, which involves learning a metric space and translating users towards items. This involves machine learning techniques such as metric learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and natural language processing (cs.CL) to some extent. Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed method on real-world datasets, which falls under the sub-category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
